text: samay hanseekhushee beet raha tha
veena ke man se dar baahar nikal chuka tha
aashaavaadee vah thee aur ab isee aasha ke saath vah har subah naene sapane sanjotee thee
doosare ke dosh ko prakat karana use nahin aata tha
doosare ke gunon ko dekhane kee usakee aadat thee
aur shaadee hue nau maheene beet gae the
dev se sahavaas ke vakt tanaav bhare kshanon se ab vah door rahana chaahatee thee
apanee shaareerik jaroorat se usane apana dhyaan hata rakha tha
dev tha ki nity koshish karata tha aur aise mein vah usake ango ko sahala kar use shaant karane kee cheshta karata aur svayan bhee unheen bhaavon mein shaant ho jaata tha
un donon kee in aantarik paristhitiyon kee kisee ko bhee khabar nahin thee
kyonki sabhee unhen sadaiv khush dekhate the
aur veena keval apanee khushiyon ko dekhakar hee santusht thee
isase alag usane kabhee kuchh na socha tha
raat ko der tak dev padhane mein vyast rahata tha aur aise mein veena ne bhee apanee aadat bana lee thee kuchh na kuchh padhane kee
dev neend se tabhee jaagata tha jab vah chaay lekar kamare mein lautatee
lekin aaj aisa nahin hua
ekaek use laga use svapn mein dev karaahata dikh raha hai
dev tadap raha hai dard ke kaaran
lekin vah jise sapana maan rahee thee vah to vaastavikata thee
jaraasee aankh khulee usakee to dekha kamare kee battee jalee huee hai aur dev bechainee se kamare mein tahal raha hai
ye kya dev to sach mein dard se bechain tha vah raharahakar apane haath se apanee kamar ke nichale hisse ko masal raha tha
aur apane dard ko dabaane kee cheshta mein usane apane nichale honth ko apane daanton ke neeche daba rakha tha
lekin dard shaayad bahut tha use ki raharahakar usake mukh se karaah nikal jaatee thee
usee karaah ne veena kee neend mein vighn daala tha
kya hua  vah ghabaraeesee uthee aur dev ke paas chalee aaee
mujhe dard ho raha hai peechhe
veena ke haathon ka sparsh paakar vah ekaek bachche kee bhaanti phaphakane laga
veena ghabara gaee
aap baithie main amit ko jagaatee hoon
vah doktar ko bula laega
veena use apane haathon ka sahaara dekar bistar kee taraph laane ko huee
nahin baithana nahin hai mujhe
aise hee aaraam mil raha hai
tab veena ka sahaara chhod kar usane haath ko peechhe kamar ke neeche tika liya aur bola  kisee ko jagaane kee jaroorat nahin hai
bas mujhe dard kee koee golee de do aur thodee tel maalish kar do
aaraam aa jaega
dev kee stadee tebal kee daraaj mein se veena ne use ek dard kee golee nikaal kar dee aur baatharoom se jaakar tel kee sheeshee nikaal laee
tab tak dev ulta hokar palang par let chuka tha
veena ne apane komal haathon se usakee maalish shuroo kar dee
maalis se dev ko aaraam aa raha tha
usaka karaahana dheeredheere ruk gaya lekin veena ne apane haathon se usakee kamar ke nichale bhaag ko malana jaaree rakha
aisa karatekarate kab usakee palaken jhapakeen use nahin pata
usee mudra mein dev kee kamar ko siraahana banaakar vah bhee so gaee
subah usakee aankh dev ke hilane se hee khuleen
ab dard kaisa hai  uthate hee veena ne dev se poochha
ab to aaraam hai
dev ne bhee bistar se uthate hue kaha
lekin aisa pahale kabhee nahin hua tha
aaj chalie apane doktar ke paas
usakee raay lena theek rahega
veena ka sujhaav dev ko pasand aa gaya
bola  haan main bhee yahee soch raha hoon
abhee taiyaar hokar chalate hain
vah apane klinik mein nau baje aa jaata hai
pahale pahunch gae to prateeksha nahin karanee padegee
theek hai
kya amit ko bhee saath le jaana hai   veena ne poochha
haan use le jaana hee theek rahega
dev ne kaha
lekin usase poochh loon usake kaam ko nukasaan na ho
veena jaanatee thee amit ko kitana bhee kaam kyon na ho vah dev ke saath kaheen jaane ko inkaar nahin karata
dev ke saath usaka bhaavanaatmak lagaav itana adhik tha ki kabheekabhee veena ko lagata tha dev bhee yadi kisee par vishvaas kar sakata hai to vah amit hee hai
veena se bhee adhik
chaaho to poochh lo
lekin yahee kahana ki ruteen chaikap ke lie jaana hai
nahin to vah vyarth mein chinta karega
dev yah kahakar nahaane ke lie chala gaya
veena tab amit ko milane kamare se baahar nikal gaee
doktar gupta ke klinik mein vah das baje hee pahunch gae
us samay abhee koee rogee nahin pahuncha tha
baahar unakee sekretaree hee baithee thee
dev ko vah ekadam se pahachaan gaee
muskura kar usane abhivaadan kiya aur bolee  bahut dinon baad aana hua aapaka kaise hain aap
main theek hoon
dev ne muskuraane kee cheshta kee
dard ab nahin tha
bola  doktar saahab se milana jarooree tha isalie pahale se samay nahin le saka
jaroor abhee to phree hain
main abhee poochh kar bataatee hoon
aap baithiye  unhen baithane ko kah usane apane saath rakhee alamaaree se dev kee phaeel nikaalee aur bheetar chalee gaee
do minat baad hee vah aakar bolee  aap bheetar ja sakate hain
dev ne tab amit ko baahar hee baithane ka sanket kiya aur veena ke saath bheetar chala gaya
doktar gupta dev kee hee prateeksha kar rahe the
badee garmajoshee se mile  aaeee kapoor saahab kaise hain aap
shaadee ho gaee
bahutabahut mubaarak ho
shukriya sar aap ko to nyauta bhee bheja tha
aap aae hee nahin
haan aapaka shubhakaamana sandesh mujhe mil gaya tha
tab veena ka parichay karavaate hue dev ne kaha  ye hai veena meree patnee
tab doktar gupta ne veena ka abhivaadan kiya  aap kaisee hain veena jee dev ke saath kaisa lag raha hai aapako
bahut achchha lagata hai sab
veena muskura kar itana hee kah paee
tab vah dev ko dekhate hue bole  bolie kaise aana hua   sab theek chal raha hai doktar saahab koee pareshaanee nahin
haan kal raat mujhe kamar se neeche bahut dard hua
itana kabhee nahin hua
raat bhar tadapata raha
dard kee golee khaee aur phir veena ne maalish kee
tab kuchh aaraam mila  dev ne vistaar se bataaya
ab bhee hai kya dard  thodee gambheer mudra mein doktar gupta ne poochha
nahin abhee to nahin hai  dev ne kaha
itanee see baat se ghabara gae itana bada opareshan ho gaya
vah dard sah liya to is dard kee itanee chinta kyon   doktar ka pesha hai apane mareez ko tasallee dena
yahee prayatn kiya unhonne
dar to lagata hee hai doktar saahab aur veena bhee chaahato thee ek baar jaroor dikhaoon main aapako
ek varsh ho chala hai jab main aapako mila tha
chalo yah to achchhee baat hai
isee bahaane aap aa gae
phir doktar gupta veena kee or dekhate hue bole  dekhie misez kapoor ghabaraane kee baat nahin hai
yah dard to laga rahata hai
kuchh jyaada kaam kar liya
kabhee kaheen na kaheen kuchh badaparahezee kar lee
bas sistam mein gadabad ho jaata hai
aur phir aap ko to ghabaraana nahin chaahie
itana bold kadam jo aapane uthaaya dev se shaadee karane ka usake baad to yah chhotaamota dard to laga hee rahata hai
veena kya dev bhee chup ho gaya
doktar gupta ka aakhiree shabd sunakar
vah kya kahatee is bold kadam kee khabar to use baad mein lagee
kuchh aur na bol paee bas muskura kar rah gaee
doktar gupta ne tab dev se kaha  chalie bheetar aapaka muaayana karate hain
veena vaheen baithee rah gaee aur dev doktar gupta ke saath bheetar chaikap ke lie chala gaya
lagabhag paanch minat lage unhen
lautakar aae to doktar gupta ne kaha  dard kee dava likh deta hoon
jab bhee thodee see bhee takaleeph mahasoos ho kha lena
aur to sab theek hai
yah kahakar unhonne dev kee phaeel par apane nots likhane shuroo kiye
ekaek vah bole  dev opareshan ke baad tumhaara redieshan to hua tha na aims ya baambe taata tum gae the na
dev ko aashchary hua sunakar  nahin doktar aisa to nahin kaha tha aapane
aap dekhie phaeel aapake paas hai
yah phaeel to opareshan ke baad kee hai
pahale kee sirph chand baaten hain isamen
jaroor tumhaaree dischaarz slip par likha hoga hamane
nahin daaktar mere paas saara rikord hai
aisa to kabhee nahin kaha tha aapane
opareshan ke baad to main dedh saal tak har maheene aapake paas aata raha tha
dev kuchh chintit ho raha tha
doktar gupta shaayad is bahas ko nahin chhedana chaahate the bole
koee ghabaraane kee baat nahin hai
tab nahin hua to ab karava lenge
lekin abhee nahin
abhee aap dard ho to dava khaate rahana
yadi yah dard badhata hee raha to behatar hoga ek baar aims mein apana chaikap jaroor karava lena
yadi ve log jaroorat samajhenge to rediyotheraipee kar denge
doktar gupta jaise chaah rahe the ekaek ki ab dev unake paas na aae
dev ne tab poochha  koee chinta kee baat hai kya doktar saahab
veena ne bhee isee aashay se doktar kee or dekha
naheennaheen aisee koee baat nahin hain
vah un donon ko tasallee dene kee cheshta karate hue bole  lekin phir bhee ek baat to dhyaan mein rakhanee hee chaahie ki dev ka yah doosara jeevan hai
hamen kisee bhee tarah ka jokhim nahin uthaana chaahie
phir redieshan kee baat kyon kee aapane  poochha veena ne
vah isalie ki abhee koee pareshaanee nahin huee to dubaara bhee na ho
tab doktar gupta ne dev se haath milaane ko apana haath aage badha diya  theek hai kapoor saahab vish yoo best oph lak
aur veena kee or apane donon haath jod die
ve donon baahar aa gae
amit unhen dekhakar uth khada hua
sekretaree ko phees ada kee
usane poochha  agalee epvaeentament hai kya
nahin abhee nahin  dev ne itana bhar kaha
raaste mein koee kuchh nahin bola
donon ke man bojhil the
aur amit unhen chup dekhakar pareshaan ho raha tha
maan kee jaroorat mahasoos kar rahee thee veena
maan nahin thee usake likhe shabdon ko dekhakar hee man halka mahasoos karane lagee
maan ne likha tha
meree pyaaree veena
main haradam eeshvar se tumhaaree va dev jee kee mangalakaamana karatee rahatee hoon
eeshvar tumhaara suhaag banae rakhe
mere jeevan mein sada se ek hee aasha rahee hai ki mere bachche sada khush rahen
tumhaare vivaahit jeevan mein tumhen khush dekhakar mujhe sadaiv is baat ka santosh rahata hai ki mainne kuchh achchhe karm hee kie the ki aaj mere bachche apaneapane parivaar ke saath khush hain
idhar rajanee kee shaadee kee chinta bhee mujhe hone lagee hai
pahale to usakee sasuraal vaale shaadee kee jaldee kar rahe the ab hain ki tumhaare daidee ne pichhale teen maah mein teen patr likh die hain koee javaab nahin aaya
ladake ke pita nahin hain to bade bhaeeyon ko jaise usakee shaadee kee chinta nahin hai
kal hee ladake ka likha patr mila hai
usee ke kahane par main aur tumhaare daidee naagapur usakee maan se milane jaana chaah rahe hain
agale haphte jaane ka prograam banaaya hai
deharaadoon se ham dillee pahunch jaenge
yadi ho sake to hamaare lie naagapur tak hee relave kee tikat karava dena
vaapisee bhee do din baad kee hee hogee
tikat buk karava kar hamen soochit kar dena
pados kee thaapa aantee ke ghar phon kar dena
vaapisee mein ham ekado din tumhaare paas bhee ruk jaenge
ghar mein hamaaree or se sabhee ko yathaayogy kahana
dev jee ko hamaara aasheervaad dena
apanee shubhakaamanaon ke saath
tumhaaree mammee
nirmala
maan ka patr padhakar veena ka bojhilaman thoda sanyat ho gaya
vah maan se mil sakegee
man ko badee saantvana milee
amit ko bulaakar usane apane maataapita ke aanejaane ka prograam bata diya
sab sunakar amit kee aankhen bhee chamak utheen
jhat se vah steshan kee or chala gaya
tikaten buk karavaane
shaam ko ghar laut kar amit ne veena bhaabhee ko naagapur aanejaane kee tikaten thama deen
veena khush ho gaee
amit se bolee  tumhen mere kaaran kitana kasht uthaana padata hai
apanee prashansa sunakar amit bola  aap aise kyon kah rahee hain mujhase
main koee paraaya hoon aapaka
are nahin aisee baat nahin hai
tum to mere apane ho
mujhe tumamen prem kee hee chhavi dikhatee hai
pahale prem mere har kaam mein sahayog deta tha
ab tum mujhe mil gae ho yahee to samajhatee hoon
veena bhaavuk ho chalee thee
mujhe sada aap prem jaisa hee paengee
dev ka chhota bhaee aapaka bhaee ban kar rahoon mujhe isase badee khushee kya milegee
veena ne tab sneh se amit ke sir par haath rakh diya aur amit bhee bhaavuk ho utha
veena ko laga koee hai yahaan bhee jisase vah apanee aantarik bhaavanaen baant sakatee hai
mammeedaidee aaenge tum unhen lekar aa jaana
steshan par bhee tumheen unhen chhod kar aana
vaapasee mein ve hamaare paas dodin rahenge
tumhen hee unaka dhyaan rakhana hoga
tab veena ne kaha usase
aapako kuchh kahane kee jaroorat nahin hai
yah mera kartavy hai
main sab dhyaan rakhoonga  amit ne use aashvast kiya
veena ko ab apane maataapita se milane kee prateeksha thee
